payload.llm_output:
- Ensure that the assistant is able to correctly identify and extract contact details from a variety of text formats and structures.
- The assistant should be able to distinguish between relevant contact information and irrelevant text, such as company headers or signatures.
- The assistant should be able to accurately identify the role of the contact, if it is mentioned in the text.
- The assistant should be able to handle cases where multiple contacts are mentioned in the text and extract all relevant information.
- The assistant should be able to handle cases where some contact information (such as the role) is missing.
- The assistant should be able to validate email formats and human names, and ignore any invalid entries.
- The assistant should return the output strictly in the specified JSON format.
